title: Derrick Lewis to Face Tallison Teixeira at UFC on ESPN 70
summary: Derrick Lewis is set to headline UFC on ESPN 70 against undefeated prospect Tallison Teixeira on July 12, 2025, at Bridgestone Arena in Nashville, Tennessee.

title: Robert Whittaker vs. Reinier de Ridder Set for UFC on ABC 9
summary: Former UFC Middleweight Champion Robert Whittaker will face former ONE Champion Reinier de Ridder in the main event of UFC on ABC 9 on July 26, 2025, at Etihad Arena in Abu Dhabi.

title: Stephen Thompson to Fight Gabriel Bonfim at UFC on ESPN 70
summary: Veteran welterweight Stephen Thompson is scheduled to face rising star Gabriel Bonfim on July 12, 2025, at UFC on ESPN 70 in Nashville.

title: Chris Curtis Returns to Welterweight Against Max Griffin at UFC on ESPN 70
summary: Chris Curtis will return to the welterweight division to face Max Griffin on July 12, 2025, at UFC on ESPN 70 in Nashville.

title: Brendan Allen vs. Marvin Vettori Rescheduled for UFC 318
summary: Middleweights Brendan Allen and Marvin Vettori are set to clash at UFC 318 on July 19, 2025, after their previously scheduled bout was postponed.

title: Nate Landwehr to Face Morgan Charriere at UFC on ESPN 70
summary: Featherweight Nate Landwehr is scheduled to fight Morgan Charriere on July 12, 2025, at UFC on ESPN 70 in Nashville.

title: Conor McGregor Expresses Interest in UFC Event at the White House
summary: Conor McGregor has shown interest in participating in a proposed UFC event at the White House in 2026, following President Trump's announcement.

title: Ilia Topuria Reveals UFC Asked Him to Delay Move to Welterweight
summary: Ilia Topuria disclosed that the UFC has requested him to postpone his move to the welterweight division to focus on his current weight class.

title: Dustin Poirier Opens as Betting Favorite Against Max Holloway for UFC White House Event
summary: Dustin Poirier has opened as the betting favorite in a potential matchup against Max Holloway for the proposed UFC event at the White House in 2026.

title: PFL Europe 2: Levi Batchelor Secures Victory with Ezekiel Choke
summary: Levi Batchelor improved his record to 3-0 with a spectacular Ezekiel choke submission over Fahdi Khaled at PFL Europe 2.
